title: Spells & Stardust
description: Spells & Stardust is Scott's first anthology - eight sci fi and fantasy shorts that run the gamut from regeneration to redemption. The Bear at the A gay fish out of water tale with a pinch of magic. What happens when your lover disappears in midair? The year when everything changed. What if you were reborn in a strange new future? A New They met every eleven years. And each time, Hank's life changed. What if you wanted to go back in the closet? Sometimes you get what you deserve. Sometimes it happens on All Hallows Eve. A few bright moments in the sun, stolen from outside time. Most of these stories have been previously published in various anthologies and journals. This is the first time they have all been collected in one place.
author: J. Scott Coatsworth
